com.snowtide.pdf.layout

Interface Bounded

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AcroFormField, Annotation, Block, DocumentLocation, Image, Line, Region, Table, TextUnit
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AcroButtonField, AcroCheckboxField, AcroChoiceField, AcroRadioButtonGroupField, AcroSignatureField, AcroTextField, FileAttachmentAnnotation, FreeTextAnnotation, LinkAnnotation, Rectangle, TextAnnotation

    public interface Bounded

    Instances of this interface represent two-dimensional spatial entities that carry a Region instance indicating their minimum bounding rectangle.
